website_summaries.verdict: Very affordable single eyeshadows that are available in many different shades.
pros: Single shadows are available in a wide variety of colors and in matte, pearl, and sparkle shades
Some shades offer different dimensions of color in one shade
cons: Some of the shades aren't very pigmented

customer_reviews.title: Good coverage and smooth application
customer_reviews.text: I love this color. It's the only shadow I'm currently wearing. I'm 60 and preferences a neutral palette. I mostly all I wear for makeup is this shadow, a bit of liner, and mascara. Boom, out the door. Lipstick or gloss if I'm feeling it. Actual foundation and blush for special occasions. This goes on smooth and is long wearing. Doesn't irritate. Great at covering my lids which tend to be on the pink/red side.
customer_reviews.author: PamFabulous

customer_reviews.title: Urban Basics is not the colors that are advertised.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered Covergirl's Urban Basics eye shadow because I wanted some light purpleish colors. The eye shadow that showed up is named Urban Basics, but there is not a single purpleish color in the kit. It comes with a white-ish color, light sparkly tan, goldish brown, and gray. I'm pretty disappointed. It's confusing because they do not provide the color number in the product description. I would have sent it back to get the color I wanted, but I can't find the color number anywhere in the product description.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Kay

customer_reviews.title: Not much difference between colors
customer_reviews.text: I'm not someone who wears much makeup, and I certainly don't have much useful experience applying it. I prefer light, neutral shadows, but even so, this compact takes light and neutral to the extreme. These colors are so minimally different that you can't build much definition without introducing other colors from a different set. I don't feel like the shadow stands up all day either, whereas neutrals from other sets seem to have longer wear times.
customer_reviews.author: @billiter

customer_reviews.title: Palette 102 Sweet Escape
customer_reviews.text: I got #102sweet escape. Upon arrival the first thing i noticed was that the colours are out of order from the pictures, but it's not a big deal. This little trio is perfect for every day wear. Each shade is a shimmery wash of colour, with the darkest shade being the most pigmented. None of the shades are matte, they all reflect light. If you are used to super pigmented shadows, just keep in mind that these are not like those. These are more sheer but you can definitely still see the shade. I have yet to test the staying power of these shadows but they go on super easy and look beautiful on the lid.
customer_reviews.author: r

customer_reviews.title: Add on seems to mean old
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these as add on’s and both were crumbed and old looking. I’m taking it off my list. I would blame the packaging but all other eyeshadow I’ve ordered has come to me intact
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value, pretty color
customer_reviews.text: Colors are gorgeous- the lightest being a perfect taupe. However I wish they were matte rather than shimmer, and they aren’t all that deeply pigmented. It takes more effort to get the shading the depth I like. But still, for the price, it’s a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Stephaniek219

customer_reviews.title: Arrived completely broken
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived completely smashed. I love this color and it’s my go-to normally. I was very disappointed to have received it broken. In it’s condition, it’s not something I can put in my makeup bag without having a huge mess and wasting all of the eyeshadow.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Not the best coverage.
customer_reviews.text: I always use Almays color pallet that I got years ago and recently it broke and they didn’t make it anymore so I figured I’d try a new brand/pallet. I wasn’t impressed with the coverage of this shadow. I am pretty pale and only the very lightest and darkest showed up on my skin tone. I was so excited to have a pallet I could use all of the colors and not have to carry around a few.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Peightal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible packaging for this item
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly the one I was looking for, however, it didn’t arrive intact. The product was a very small item which was shipped in a very large envelope, leaving a lot of room for it to move around during transit. The eyeshadow was broken into tiny pieces. I am very dissatisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Swedberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice simple color
customer_reviews.text: This is just a pretty color-neutral and simple! I love wearing just this shadow alone w/o any other shadow. Been my fave for years!
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colour!✨
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous colour which works well with my pale skin tone. Beautiful blue with as beautiful shine that's not overwhelming. Can highly recommend this product and will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly M.

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better quality brand. You’re worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow is really dry or something. When I swipe the applicator, the eyeshadow gets crumbly and makes a mess. When I apply it, it goes on in a clump and most of it falls off into the sink. I threw it away because it’s just to much of a hassle to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: BR

customer_reviews.title: Item came intact, and its cute eyeshadow too!
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the blue, and the champagne color, I've used champagne as my daily eyeshadow for a while, and usually buy it at the store, but this wasa great deal, and they came in tact, and exactly as expected. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin D. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Champagne is SHIMMER
customer_reviews.text: I don't use shimmer eyeshadow I combed through reviews looking for champagne and shimmer found none! Yes!! Champagne is shimmer! Great highlighter but I already have 10 highlighters!! Ps it's VERY shimmer! Search continues for a base non- shimmer
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very good pricing
customer_reviews.text: can only use Covergirl has use Covergirl four years certain products or there's a very hard to find in the stores this particular eyeshadow is very hard to find finding it on Amazon was great
customer_reviews.author: pic 3

customer_reviews.title: Essential item
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eyeshadow- the brown is the perfect shade and the lighter color is perfect for blending. It’s one of my go to essential makeup items that you can’t live without.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea F

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged, they need better packaging. The grey color was crumbling, I can’t even use it, but it’s not really worth returning. Very disappointed, as I love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shadow Set
customer_reviews.text: This was lighter than it looks online but it is still a very nice set. The shadow does have some shimmer, but it isn't excessive. I am 60 and really like the neutral colors.. my 29 year old daughter liked it so well she also bought a set.
customer_reviews.author: TD

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Usually I am worried that these will come to me broken, but this wasn't. The packaging was perfect to keep this from happening. Now, on to the color. I ordered the Champagne which is a shimmery ivory. I use it on the upper brow bone. I am very pale so this color basically shows up just shimmery, which is exactly what I wanted. It lasts all day, even without eye primer too. Can't beat that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Classic and pretty cool brown.
customer_reviews.text: I used to wear this color in high school and I just rediscovered it and like it a lot. I was looking for a cooler brown color and this is a great option.
customer_reviews.author: SCJC

customer_reviews.title: Not very pigmented
customer_reviews.text: You really have to dig to get any color out of this pallet. There is glitter in the nude color which makes it hard to get the powder out then when you swipe it on all you see is glitter. I ended up going to the store and buying another pallet for daily use. I set this one to the side for when I need a backup.
customer_reviews.author: Julia K

customer_reviews.title: Rarely used
customer_reviews.text: Only made my eyes look like I had no eye shadow on at all. I just want to know where the “eye enhancer” was. Sitting off to one side of my make up bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to find certain colors of my makeup on stores anymore. This made the find so much easier. The product was not broken when I received it. And I didn’t feel like I was paying more than what I would have in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Baker

customer_reviews.title: GOES ON LIGHTER THAN IT LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: This color looks darker in the compact then how it actually goes on the eyelid. I like it even more than I thought I would. It's such a great color that I use it as a highlighter under my eyebrow, as well as a medium shade to go across my eyelid.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley Keegan

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile color!
customer_reviews.text: Love this color! Hope they don't get rid of it anytime soon! Very neutral-can be used over the top of a color to add a little sparkle or by itself as a nice sheer glimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Minna p

customer_reviews.title: Much darker than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this is a bad product or not.. I’m sure it works great, but as you can see from my photo the eyeshadow is MUCH darker than the online image. :(
customer_reviews.author: Anna E G

customer_reviews.title: Product was broken
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is good. But it was broken when it arrived and as we all know...it's just going to continue to crumble.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Nice color!
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty but the consistency is very chalky so there's a lot of fallout. I do like that the pan is quite large though.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: Just wright
customer_reviews.text: Don't know quite what to write about the product but it came early it was just the right color no cracks I enjoyed the product it was just the right
customer_reviews.author: Lori nalley

customer_reviews.title: Love this shade
customer_reviews.text: Love this shade. I was looking for one similar to the eyelid shade in the Covergirl trio Shimmering sands. This is a little darker, but works well with many looks. Applies very well, lasts well, but I always use an eye primer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: and this is first time I was not happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it's the sponge application stick or the eye shadow itself, but it's rough and rubs the eye lid. I've been a Covergirl eye shadow customer for more years than I care to share, and this is first time I was not happy with the product. Colors were great after you have it applied, but putting it on was not pleasant, so I've quit using.
customer_reviews.author: Linda D.

customer_reviews.title: Never have
customer_reviews.text: ordered eyeshower online before, but I was very pleased with this product. It's just the right colors I wanted and came in a few days after ordering...the colors are nice and gone on very well...was surprised that it wasn't broken up as it was with another product much bigger and heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Color Matched and Price was Great
customer_reviews.text: I was down to the last of my eye shadow and looked at store prices and colors whenever I was in a store. So often companies included 3 or more shades in a container which I did not want. This price was great and the color matched what was shone.
customer_reviews.author: K LTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful colors
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye shadow . It’s smooth and goes on great . This is my go too eyeshadow. Always have to have it .
customer_reviews.author: lisalisa38

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: The pigments aren’t super concentrated - or varying for that matter. They pretty much look mostly the same once they’re on your eye. Additionally the powder has already broken from being transported in my makeup bag.
customer_reviews.author: Becca Gal

customer_reviews.title: Great Eyeshadow for CHEAP price!
customer_reviews.text: Just love this color & the price! You mainly have to get it sometimes as an add-on so when you are buying other stuff, add this on!
customer_reviews.author: AZ Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Doubtful if received the same color advertised
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow product is sealed and not broken, so I’ll give it a try, but I don’t believe it to be the same shade as the advertisement. There is something sketchy/dishonest about purchasing a 2 pack product but the box was clearly a 3 pack and blacked out with a sharpie...with a “sold as set do not separate” sticker on the box. I don’t appreciate that.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Denton

customer_reviews.title: More of a shear then a tan color
customer_reviews.text: This product then it really suit me very well... When I put it on, it didn't come on the color that it showed on the palette. It came on Sheer. That was a little mix direction to me.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Great colors and great value
customer_reviews.text: The colors were soft and pretty for my skin which is very pale with freckles The pink had a nice sparkle to it but not too much. Just right.
customer_reviews.author: Weldon Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very light color. Not white!
customer_reviews.text: I love this color to highlight my brow-bone. It has great lasting pigment. Hardly falls.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Color
customer_reviews.text: This color is perfect for the inner eye, to bring some light to your face. I use this daily after eye liner and before mascara and its just a hint of fancy to a daily look. The color matches the photo but does have a slight shimmer; not glitter but not matte. It's the perfect blend.
customer_reviews.author: SS-Beantown

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Been using this eye shadow for years. It doesn't feel heavy and goes on easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Favorite.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite eye shadow. It goes on smoothly & lasts plus the colors are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Great color
customer_reviews.text: The color is darker in person than I thought but it is still a pretty shade and I will use it. I have been using physician formula makeup and decider I wanted a change so I bought all new make up. I'm glad I can get it online at such a good price! Arrived quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Reid

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented!
customer_reviews.text: The eyeshadow lasts for a while especially if you use primer. It makes nude eyeshadow application easy with the assortment of colors and they are easy to blend and very pigmented for the price it was.
customer_reviews.author: Kait Reviews

customer_reviews.title: soft blue !!!!
customer_reviews.text: nice soft blue. hard to find in stores. will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary C.

customer_reviews.title: Love The Color
customer_reviews.text: Love this to add a little color that gives me a younger appearance.
customer_reviews.author: LLB

customer_reviews.title: I was shopping specifically for a matte shadow, not ...
customer_reviews.text: I was shopping specifically for a matte shadow, not anything with shimmer, and this is exactly what it is, a shimmer , and it was misleading .
customer_reviews.author: Cindy McD

customer_reviews.title: This is a crumbly mess to put on
customer_reviews.text: This is a crumbly mess to put on. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sparkle Sparkle
customer_reviews.text: Pretty, sparkling shadow. Lightweight, no fragrance. Based on other reviews, I was concerned about breakage. It arrived fine, wrapped in bubble plastic. Excellent price vs. drugstore too!
customer_reviews.author: John K.

customer_reviews.title: Highlight eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: I love this eyeshadow as a highlight for my eyes. I can’t seem to find it at any store. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia

customer_reviews.title: A great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this brand of eye shadow for years at my local drug store, and the price I found this item on Amazon is amazing and you get 2. Will be buying many more times.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Boyce

customer_reviews.title: Worst pallet - the colors all end up looking the same
customer_reviews.text: Powdery. Colors all are way too similar and sheer on. Blend almost as if they’re all the same color. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: good value
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for some time and always happy with the way it goes on and stays!
customer_reviews.author: jeanpinky

customer_reviews.title: Smoky, classy eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: Cover Girl is MY favorite make up brand period. I am wild about NatureLuxe especially. I have sensitive skin, and I want a natural healthy look. The shadow was ever so slightly crumbly in one corner when I unpackaged it, but the shade is a classy and smoky dark taupe. I applies easily. I love it. I am fair skinned, and I apply it to the crease area.
customer_reviews.author: ZumbaLover

customer_reviews.title: Looove
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to find this shade in the stores I'm glad I found it online it's the PERFECT shade for a brown highlight
customer_reviews.author: LiZee

customer_reviews.title: Beware of add on items
customer_reviews.text: As an add on item, it was thrown loose in a box with another item. By the time it arrived it was dust. I liked the color, but will not order again. And since it was only $2 will not return.
customer_reviews.author: elmerwane

customer_reviews.title: It doesnt look smooth on eyes
customer_reviews.text: It comes on really weird and not smooth at all
customer_reviews.author: Kialie

customer_reviews.title: Great colors
customer_reviews.text: colors are exactly what I want and saw on the page. Arrived intact. Applies smoothly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect color and price
customer_reviews.text: I’d been looking for a replacement eye shadow for my favorite color and finally found this one. Easy to use and good price
customer_reviews.author: Super Mimi

customer_reviews.title: My dog  loves them.
customer_reviews.text: She is fussy when it comes to food or goodies. She loves these
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Anderson

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful shade. Natural and pretty for every day
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful shade. Natural and pretty for every day. Can barely see them except for the dark gray color. But it was just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thank you, it’s great!
customer_reviews.text: This came in excellent condition. I took the eyeshadow applicator out on my own so just know it comes with it. I’ve been using this color for about a decade now and I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Coco

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Smooth texture and color.
customer_reviews.text: I love the color palette and the smooth texture. I like this much better than a more expensive brand I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The color is perfect to contrast the top of my eyelid above a ...
customer_reviews.text: The color is perfect to contrast the top of my eyelid above a smoky brown shadow. Been using this shade for years.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Eyeshadow/Shade
customer_reviews.text: My favorite eyeshadow/shade. No longer sold in stores so glad I was able to find it online.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, add on item so excellent price. Cruelty free ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Well done
customer_reviews.text: I received the eye shadow each with bubble wrap around them. All 3 eye shadow were fully intact. I would definitely buy from this person again. Thank you for a job well done! Stay safe
customer_reviews.author: dawn marie sanfratello

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I really like these 4 neutral colors. Use it everyday
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Tornincasa

customer_reviews.title: I don't like the shimmer/sparkle look
customer_reviews.text: I wanted matte colors. These are shimmery and very light. I don't like the shimmer/sparkle look. I'm not returning it, but I surely will not use it. I'll give it away. Why is it so hard to find matte colors in decent shades? Not everyone wants to look like they are headed to a night club.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott Piel

customer_reviews.title: Nice eye shadow
customer_reviews.text: I simply don't love the colors, I prefer browns and this is more of grey tones. Quality of make up is good.
customer_reviews.author: S. Farschon

customer_reviews.title: Country Woods
customer_reviews.text: Just as they are in the store. Good color. Long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Surprised it was broken
customer_reviews.text: Love it Was shipped in a huge box with now packing
customer_reviews.author: Marie Hill

customer_reviews.title: Covergirl eyeshadow
customer_reviews.text: This was a good color for me so I bought 2!! Had been looking for a light blue eye shadow for the longest and eureka...Covergirl had exactly what I wanted. I recommend their eyeshadows for not only color but for lasting durability.
customer_reviews.author: Kris D

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little disappointed but it still works
customer_reviews.text: I thought the color would be a little different, possibly a little darker. I'm a little disappointed but it still works. It is hard buying make up Online for this reason! Still okay though.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyco

customer_reviews.title: Shimmery and disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The two middle shades have sparkle or are shimmery. Wasn't expecting that. Was trying to find ones without actually. Otherwise it's fine.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Lasts
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at the staying power. Just a little bit of glimmer.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegoose53

customer_reviews.title: Good standard tones, from trusted and reliable maker
customer_reviews.text: Nice neutral tones, almost a matte, colors are exactly as they appear in picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Starr

customer_reviews.title: These were definitely a it darker than pictured but goes on perfectly smoothly and stays on all day (fades of course but have't
customer_reviews.text: Purple palettes work with my eye color. These were definitely a it darker than pictured but goes on perfectly smoothly and stays on all day (fades of course but have't found many comfortable eye shadows that don't).
customer_reviews.author: Kim Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Not a new product!
customer_reviews.text: I received this in the mail yesterday. It was opened, the lid was scratched up, and one eye shadow color showed signs of use.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Perfect glimmer
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect shade to add a little shimmer to your eyes but not go crazy with the glitter.
customer_reviews.author: Freddie Soto

customer_reviews.title: Not long-weared
customer_reviews.text: The powder is not really thin. And I applied it in morning, it cannot exsit in afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: Ray G

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt go on well!
customer_reviews.text: I am thinking that this makeup is old. I have to wet it some to get it on my eyes and then it clumps up. YUCK!
customer_reviews.author: T. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't look like to much
customer_reviews.text: Just right for my 66 year old eyes. Doesn't look like to much, very subtle that works
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: No color pigments and it didn’t work at all
customer_reviews.text: Hardly any pigmented color at all. It was a waste of money at least for the eye shadow I received.
customer_reviews.author: K-T Designs

customer_reviews.title: Animal safe- not tested on animals.
customer_reviews.text: Would like to have two applicators due to color contrasts.
customer_reviews.author: Elaina

customer_reviews.title: It has sparkles in it.
customer_reviews.text: I had thought I was ordering a matte color, but it has "sparkles" in it that don't look good on an older face.
customer_reviews.author: Searching for Answers

customer_reviews.title: Great Neutral Colors
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exact colors I was wanting. Stays on...doesn't smudge. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: NMGal

customer_reviews.title: Good Choice
customer_reviews.text: Subtle Eyeshadows. Smooth coverage. This isn't a palette that is gonna wow at night, but it looks good with a dewy natural day time look.
customer_reviews.author: J. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty color!
customer_reviews.text: Besides loving the color,Ive actually discovered its the perfect color to use on different parts of your eye.Depending on the look your going for. Plus, great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Holland

customer_reviews.title: Love this color!!
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite! I was so bummed when I couldn't find it in any store so I was thrilled when I found it online! It doesn't have the glitter that some do and it seems to work well with any tone (summer tone/winter white tone).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great eye-shadow, but came crushed...
customer_reviews.text: I love this eye-shadow, but I ordered 3, and 2 came with the eye-shadow crushed and therefore messy and hard to apply...:-(
customer_reviews.author: Janet Demuth Reichenberg

customer_reviews.title: Kinda misleading based on pics
customer_reviews.text: Not very pigmented, very sparkly which I didnt want, and it looks pinkish via pics online however is not pink at all...more neutral colored.
customer_reviews.author: tara savage

customer_reviews.title: I like a light look and it works
customer_reviews.text: I've been buying this for years..... I like a light look and it works. I've had one person who considers herself a fashionista (that cracks me up) ask what I was wearing and went out and bought it although she only buys high end cosmetics. There you go!
customer_reviews.author: stacer26

customer_reviews.title: Perfect brow bone highlight
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this color for years and use it as a brow highlight every day, love love love
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Was glad I did
customer_reviews.text: Have been looking for this color for years and didn't even think to check Amazon. Was glad I did. Color accentuates any eye color and goes with any clothing color scheme.
customer_reviews.author: L. Webb

customer_reviews.title: Natural looking
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in bubble wrap that prevented item from getting damaged. Great natural color.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ann

customer_reviews.title: Terrible !
customer_reviews.text: The color was supposed to be champagne but was a bright silver, one for New Year's Eve when you really want something dramatic. Very heavy and would not rub off. I had to scrub it off. I'll be returning it first chance I can get out my shelter in place.
customer_reviews.author: I. S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s blue...
customer_reviews.text: Came broken up and really sparkles. Too much for me
customer_reviews.author: Martha chludzinski

customer_reviews.title: Not bad actually
customer_reviews.text: This eyeshadow kit is actually not that bad. I kind of like the colors, but it doesn't stay on for that long. The quality is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Don Nara

product_meta.title: Covergirl Eye Enhancers Eyeshadow Kit, Champagne, 1 Color
product_meta.description:
Style:1-Shadow| Color:Shadow Champagne| Size:Pack of 1Whether you’re feeling natural and breezy or intense and dramatic, Covergirl Eye Enhancers Eyeshadow has got you covered. This versatile eyeshadow has a silky, sheer formula you can easily blend to create the look you desire. With endless colors to choose from, you can mix and match with matte, pearly, or sparkly shades for a customized look. The included double-ended applicator has soft sponge tips for keeping your eyeshadow light or building it up for a bold effect. Pro Tip: For extra dimension, apply a darker color to the crease and outside of your eyelid before covering the entire lid with a lighter shade.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: BLEND IT, BEAUTIFUL: This eyeshadow has a silky sheer formula that blends easily for the look you want
SHADES FOR DAYS: A color for every mood thanks to the many available shades
MAKE IT YOU: Mix and match with other matte, pearly, or sparkly shades for a custom look that’s all you
DOUBLE-ENDED APPLICATOR: Use the applicator with soft sponge tips to build coverage for drama, or lightly sweep on a for a more natural look
